English: For the blue girl who just wanted to watch a football match from the stadium
notes: The tweet refers to the death of Sahar Khodayari, also known as Blue Girl. She was an Iranian soccer fan who tried to break the country's ban on women attending sporting events by posing as a man and entering the Azadi Stadium to watch her favorite team play. She was detained, and the Islamic Revolutionary Court of Tehran informed her in court that she might receive a six-month prison sentence. After leaving court, she committed suicide through self-immolation in front of the building.
